tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to directory traversal due to insufficient sanitization in the `openHTMLTagHandler` function when processing `` tags. An attacker can exploit this by crafting malicious image tag attributes that traverse directories and access unauthorized files.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `tecnick.com/tcpdf` library to the patch version.
